titlestmt.titleproper: Presbyterian and Reformed Library Association records 1988-1988
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Presbyterian and Reformed Library Association records

bioghist.p: The object of the Presbyterian and Reformed Library Association was "the improvement of the libraries and library resources of the theological seminaries and historical agencies of members of the Association; the conservation of materials in these libraries; and the development of bibliographic tools and resources for Presbyterian and Reformed history."

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a set of minutes of the June 21st, 1988, meeting of the Presbyterian and Reformed Library Association. The minutes include reports of member libraries and a copy of the Association's constitution.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
